title: Coordinate Closing
description: A transaction has received the 'clear to close' from the lender. The TC must coordinate the final steps.

tasks.description: Confirm the closing date, time, and location with the title company.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies the final appointment details.

tasks.description: Schedule the final walkthrough for the buyer the day before closing.
tasks.expected_outcome: An appointment for the final walkthrough is scheduled with all parties.

tasks.description: Send a 'Closing Confirmation' email to the client with the appointment details and a reminder to bring their ID.
tasks.expected_outcome: A clear, instructional email is sent to the client.
